comments.text:
I recently bought 2 bottles of Pantene Shampoo for the 1st time bcs I 
always used sth else. I went into the shower with greasy hair and actually 
had to realize that my hair was still greasy after blow drying it. After 
trying the shampoo for several times I gave up - it simply does not clean 
the hair. Never happened to me with another shampoo before. I wonder why 
nobody around me has discovered this before!!﻿

comments.text:
"Dopamine is a hormone associated with lust, gambling, and addiction"
who the fuck explains it that way?
Dopamine is a neurotransmitter and a hormone that rewards the brain.
Good job buzzfeed, you set a bad example for dopamine.﻿
comments.author: spy

comments.text:
Why would Netflix want you to binge-watch? The less watching you get done 
in a month, the better, as long as you stay a loyal customer. Less Watching 
Per Month = More Months to Finish Series x, thus decreasing the chance for 
them to discontinue their Netflix subscription in the middle of a great 
series. I don't see why they would care about how much you watch as opposed 
to paying for their service, given there are no advertisements present when 
you actually watch a show.﻿

comments.author: Dirpy Turtle

comments.text:
Not many people realize this, but even videos questioning big brands are 
indirectly promoting them. Channels like Buzzfeed are purveyors of pop 
culture, and brand presence here means a big deal for a brand. This is 
because it is constantly reinforcing the brand in people's minds. Social 
media content like YouTube videos is one of the most powerful ways to make 
this happen, and we advise companies on this. Head to Think Big Online 506,
275 Alfred St,
North Sydney, Australia
P: 02 9460 0581 for customized digital marketing solutions for your brand's 
online needs.﻿
